        public <T> boolean ensureAttachmentValue(AttachmentKey<T> key,
                                T expectedValue)
        Description copied from interface: Attachable
        Ensure that an attachment has the specified value, setting it if it is missing.
        Specified by:
        ensureAttachmentValue in interface Attachable
        Type Parameters:
        T - the value type
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        expectedValue - the expected value
        Returns:
        true if the attachment value is already, or was added to be, equal to expectedValue, false otherwise
